class ${1:name}::Component < ApplicationViewComponent

  # ==== HTML Config

  # html do
  #   style {
  #     base { %w[font-bold] }
  #   }
  # end

  # ==== Attributes

  attribute :title,
    type:     :string,
    default:  '${1:name}',
    optional: true

  # ==== Slots

  # ==== Delegators

  # ==== Instance

  def call
    tag.h1(title)
  end

end
